name: The Fence (TriJam#187)
description:
Stay here forever (TriJam#187)

There was no time for audio-optimization. Loading time can look like if the game freezes by 90% of the loading bar! Just wait... It takes 10 seconds, maybe more, depends on your internet speed.

Survive as long as possible by shooting the aliens.
Try to pick up as many upgrades as possible.

Left Button: Standard Ammo (or upgraded, if available).
Right Button: Shoot an ACID BOMB (10s cooldown).

Game Ends when an Alien passes your gun. Then you are overrun.

KNOWN BUGS

Out of time... as always... PAUSE (ESC) does not work, Aliens keep coming - sorry!
Once you started, you have to play through.

No time for "fence-climbing-animation" - it looks as if the aliens would walk straight through the fence... One hour more... Just one hour...

Developed in 3 hours plus a Team-mate spending a little over 2 hours with audio asset selection and play-testing while I was coding with burning keys as fast as I could.
He also "animated" the aliens once we picked them from a cc0 Collection.
